label: 国家珍宝帳
対訳語: Record of the Nation's Rare Treasures.
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
見出し読み: こっかしんぽうちょう
説明文: A list of favorite imperial objects that were donated to the Great Buddha of Tōdai-ji by Empress Kōmyō on 21 June 756, fortynine days after the death of her husband Emperor Shōmu. The extant treasures from this list are stored in the Shōsō-in's North Section. See also Tōdaiji kemmotsu chō. [東大寺、光明、聖武、正倉院、東大寺献物帳]
